overview: Mark Tuchmann founded BeavEx in 1989 when he was 22 years old and has been the prime driver for the company’s rapid growth. He developed the company’s vision of ensuring that the quality and professionalism our customers deserve are realized through the application of technology. He continues to identify new opportunities to expand the scope and breadth of our transportation services. Mark is also extensively involved in the day-to-day aspects of the company’s operations and sales efforts. Mark has a Bachelors Degree in Finance from Southern Connecticut State University.
